title: Given 2 free wins when i got into promos?
body: hello, okay so ive just made it into my promos for silver from bronze 1 for the third time this week and i got this message just after id finished my game saying that ive qualified for my series etc but it also said something about been given 2 free wins in my promos, i didnt read it only glimsted at it cause i thought it was just the message saying id qualified but i saw that, can someone please elaborate to me what this was? is it cause ive been grinding so much or something, my "mmr" is to high maybe idk, thoughts? thank you

replies.body:
in this season if you get into promos straight after losing promos you get 1 free win or 2 free wins(depending if it is a 5-game or 3 game promo series).
To stop bronze and some silver complaining about "OMG just got trolled riot fixed your game." or "F**k you Riot put trolls into the game and won't take em away." These are just examples I don't use these... Okay one time when I was bronze 4 but I have never trolled since.(expect in customs).

I like the idea. If you are constantly getting into promos, it means you are NOT meant to be where you are currently sitting. There is no other way of interpreting that, and losing promos to AFK/feeders/bad team in general sucks when you know you are better than bronze fucking 4 (i got to bronze 1 from my original promos.)

> [{quoted}](name=noogai,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KeQVA6Bd,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-25T13:52:24.061+0000)
>
> I like the idea. If you are constantly getting into promos, it means you are NOT meant to be where you are currently sitting. There is no other way of interpreting that, and losing promos to AFK/feeders/bad team in general sucks when you know you are better than bronze fucking 4 (i got to bronze 1 from my original promos.)

I like the idea also, because somehow I seem to fail my promos. It's like Riot constructed promos that you have to carry four other noobs to qualify, even if you are the support. Players in promos definitely seem noobish compared to the other ranked lol games, for some reason.

Stopped reading at 'know you are better'

No. If you are in bronze 4 you should be there. If you can't win 2/3 games in promos, even if it takes you a few attempts to get there, then you belong there

Was bronze 1 from my initial promos, and stayed there for about 2-3 months. I don't think any statistics websites will show what divisions I was in before, but from that alone, I KNOW i'm better than bronze 4.
So you got placed higher than you belong
You could say that. Although the fact that I stayed there for 2-3 consecutive months might say something to the contrary.
Ain't nobody climbing out of bronze with a 45% win rate and 5 wards per game

Wow you should have seen my ranked win % ages ago. It's almost like win % changes the more you play, huh? Considering I haven't played ranked since preseason released, and considering I was climbing at the time, I'd consider my win rate higher, check my normals for a better understanding of my play.

Interested to see where you're seeing my ward placement percentage. Because lately my games end before I can get more than 5 wards out. I generally save my wards for when I need them, as our support is blasting wards around to score vision, and I play top so wards are mostly anti-gank measures.

But, keep being a snarky bastard, I'm sure that'll get you out of bronze 3, with the exact same win rate as me :^)

Considering normal games have no influence on your ranked standings, I will not look at, or consider them.

I get your ward score from wardscore.loltools.net

And yes I'm bronze 3. He difference though, is that I know I belong there. I'm don't think of myself as the messiah that plays at gold level despite having little impact on a game.


Oh and to touch on your wards again, even if every one of your games finishes at 20 minutes, I think that's a max of 30 wards you can have down with no wastage? Obviously that's over the top, but you see where I come from when I say that 5 is pretty poor

So I belong in bronze because of my ranked statistics, but if I play better in normals, and have much better stats there, you don't consider that to be a significant factor to why I shouldn't be bronze 4?

Okay then. Disregard the fact completely that I stomp people that are the same MMR or slightly higher than me in normals and consistently do well, and look only at my ranked statistics, even though clearly the majority of my league playtime has been in normal games. That's fine if you do that, but you're not being objective, you're being obtuse.

I don't consider myself a gold level player. Congratulations in constructing a strawman and burning it, but that doesn't make you correct. I simply consider myself higher than bronze 4. Silver, at best, but bronze 1 is where I was 2-3 month ago and FOR 2-3 months, so I consider myself at that level.

Ok stop talking about normals! Anyone can stomp normals. Normals is where people go to try out new champs or new builds or to dick around. It has ZERO relation to your ranked standings. Ever. None. Nothing. Forever.

On that note though, I just checked out your normal games. You certainly don't stomp. You die a lot. Like, heaps. Like, enough to make me think you are being carried.

"Waah stop talking about the place where the majority of your games are played and trying to use that as a statistic in relevance to your actual skill because it doesn't have ranked in the name"

Sounds like you're mad that I don't play a lot of ranked, and that ranked isn't an actual measure of my skill because I don't play enough of it to have it be an accurate measure of how I play.

Been playing a bunch of games with friends. MMR's getting shifted, friendly games lead to me not caring.

On a side note, most of my games have me with more kills than deaths. I take it you're ignoring the 17/3 illaoi game because she's a new champ, but what about the games with TF where I nearly go a solid 2.0 KDA, the game with ekko where I crushed in KDA and while we lost, I was carrying pretty hard up until the point where the enemy team could collapse on me.

Of course, it's easy to say that you think I'm being carried. You're more than welcome to 1v1 me.

Not sure why you're so mad though. I've proven multiple times that I legit play better than you think I do. I don't ward as much as I should, sure. Then again, I mostly hammer out top and/or adc/jungle games, and adc has a support to do the warding, jungle doesn't ward as much and at top I ward when I don't have vision of enemy movements. I'm smart enough with my map management to not need to ward as much as other people. Warding doesn't mean shit if you can't mechanically play the champ you're playing, and mechanical play is where I excel.

Now I'm even more convinced that you belong in bronze.
You talk about warding and skill as though you only need to cover yourself.
The support is not there to ward for the adc. The support is there to ward for the team. Top is not there to ward only for top. The whole team needs vision. Mechanical skill helps, sure. But the moment you stop looking after yourself, and instead look after the team (you know, those other 4 people in the game) you will start to climb.

Your lane is warded but you've got a spare one in your pocket and a few spare moments of time? Ward the enemy jungle

It's just the new "Promo Helper" system added in 5.23, it basically just means you're more likely to pass a promo if you've been up for it previously (but haven't been demoted since) or if you've passed it before.
